page.title: 03LIFE IN FREELAND
page.content:
Rachel has one brother and one sister who are younger than her. We asked her what she did in the evenings, she replied "I watch the television". She has one cat as her pet. At the weekends Rachel goes out with her friends to play. She entertains herself by going to Guides, tennis, modern dancing and things like that. She thinks life in Freeland is good and really enjoys it.
Rachel told us that she walks to school or comes in the car. She never has school dinners so she doesn't know what they are like. There are 33 children in her class and more than 100 in the school. Her favourite subjects are maths and handwriting, and other favourite subjects are art, painting and study.
